targets.query: select release,  promo_name, distro, latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("promo_name" = 'current-tripleo' AND "distro" = 'centos-9' AND "release" = 'wallaby')

select release,  promo_name, distro, latest_build_date, promotion_details, last(aggregate_hash) from "dlrn-promotion" where ("promo_name" = 'current-tripleo' AND "distro" = 'centos-8' AND "release" = 'wallaby')

panels.description: List of the latest failing integration / promotion  jobs.

targets.query: SELECT "job_name","status","criteria","logs","duration","failure_reason","test_hash"  FROM "autogen"."jobs_result" WHERE ("job_type" = 'integration' AND "release" = 'wallaby' and "job_name" =~ /centos-9/ and "status" = '0') AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Centos 9 - Failing integration jobs

panels.description: List of the latest failing integration / promotion  jobs.

targets.query: SELECT "job_name","status","criteria","logs","duration","failure_reason","test_hash"  FROM "autogen"."jobs_result" WHERE ("job_type" = 'integration' AND "release" = 'wallaby' and "job_name" =~ /centos-8/ and "status" = '0') AND $timeFilter

targets.query: SELECT "job_name","status","criteria","logs","duration","failure_reason","test_hash"  FROM "autogen"."jobs_result" WHERE ("job_type" = 'integration' AND "release" = 'wallaby' and "job_name" =~ /centos-9/ and "status" != '0') AND $timeFilter
